text: Jerry N. Uelsmann (June 11, 1934 â€“ April 4, 2022) was an American photographer. He was known for his photomontage work. His works helped create the Adobe Photoshop to make surrealistic images. He won the Lucie Award in Fine Art in 2015. Uelsmann died on April 4, 2022 in Gainesville, Florida at the age of 87.Photomontage Pioneer Jerry Uelsmann Dies in Florida At 87 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American photographers Category:Educators from Detroit
title: Jerry Uelsmann
